name: BlueDolmen
short_description:
BlueDolmen is a set of software to manage mail and flow with citizen and external partners (companies, customers, provides, ...) in a company or a local community, authority, ...

It provides out-of -the-box applications based on the unique document repository Alfresco with their own UI.

Blue Mail, the mail management application, enables people to process mail from digitization, mail creation through Alfresco collaborative features and sending and track all their change so you can reproduce traceability.
summary: Domain Software Suite for companies and authorities
